startups.name: Early-Stage Startup

fitAnalysis.message: Startups value your learning mindset and adaptability

whyFeasible: Startups need engineers who can wear many hats
Your willingness to learn new technologies is valued
You get to see full product lifecycle from idea to scale
Direct impact on company success is more visible
whatYouNeed: Comfort working with minimal processes and documentation
Ability to switch between different parts of the stack quickly
Entrepreneurial mindset and passion for the problem space

rounds.name: Practical Assessment - Real Problem
points: Solve a real problem the startup is facing
Show you can build something quickly

rounds.name: Culture Fit - Adaptability & Growth
points: Share experience building products from scratch
Show enthusiasm for the startup's mission
